author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KRISTY MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD AS A POWERFUL MAJOR HURRICANE...
summary:
...KRISTY MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD AS A POWERFUL MAJOR HURRICANE...
 As of 2:00 AM PDT Fri Oct 25
 the center of Kristy was located near 15.2, -123.9
 with movement WNW at 14 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 932 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 150 mph.
